title: Response surface methodology for the optimization of process parameters during hot air frying of chicken sausage incorporated with corn bran

Response Surface Methodology was used to study the effects of hot-air frying temperature (HFT; 170-190 oC) and time (HFt; 15-25 minutes) on some critical quality attributes of chicken sausage incorporated...
